DOC.brief_summary: The presented study is designed to analyze the efficacy of pancreatic stent insertion in patients undergoing ERCP with accidental cannulation of the pancreatic duct.
DOC.brief_title: Post-ERCP Pancreatitis Prevention by Stent Insertion
DOC.criteria: all patients undergoing ERCP with unintended cannulation or opifiacation of main pancreatic duct age > 17 years signed informed consent intention to intervene main pancreatic duct age < 18 years pregnancy absent of signed informed consent
